div.p: Period during which years are numbered and dates reckoned.

Period during which years are numbered and dates reckoned, such as CE (Common Era) or BCE (Before Common Era). Suggested values include "ce" and "bce". This optional attribute is available in date, fromDate, and toDate.

div.egXML: <dateRange> <fromDate calendar="gregorian" certainty="approximate" era="ce" standardDate="1950"> 1950 </fromDate> <toDate calendar="gregorian" certainty="approximate" era="ce" standardDate="2000"> 2000 </toDate> </dateRange>
